document_data.mainbody:
he Bloodmuck was a lake in the land of Thar in the Moonsea North region of north Faer√ªn.
The Bloodmuck served as the source of a short winding Tormel River that flowed from the lake towards the Moonsea to the south, where it met the sea at the city of Melvaunt. The lake was located to the northwest from the hills of the Fangjaws Hold, a collection of stone and turf lodges of the Skullsmashers ogres. On the lakes southwestern shore stood Nouth,
